ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && NOT(OR($RecordType.Name = "Health & Benefits", $RecordType.Name = "Scale", BRP_VR_Override__c = true )) &&
AND( ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c , "Renewal"), ISPICKVAL( Billing__c , "Agency"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Proposal Approved/Closed Won"), Marketer_UW_Name__c = "0033700000NPmne" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Travelers Renewals are direct bill only
